title: Man driving pickup wanted for molesting 2 women in N.J. borough, cops say
body: Police want to question this man following two incidents last week of criminal sexual contact in Bergen County.Police in Bergen County are looking for a man who they say molested two women last week on the streets of Rutherford.The first incident occurred shortly after 6 p.m. on Carmita Avenue near Donaldson and Woodward Avenues, according to borough police.The 28-year-old woman told police she was jogging when the suspect pulled alongside her in a black pickup truck, leaned out the window and slapped her buttocks.The second occurred about 6:41 p.m. Friday on Montross Avenue near Donaldson Avenue when a 34-year-old woman was grabbed while pushing her child in a stroller, police said.The woman told police the man had been sitting alone in the pickup truck, got out and grabbed her.Police on Monday released a security photo taken of the man and his truck.The suspect is white, in his 20s, about 5-feet, 9-inches tall, thin with brown hair and a thin, brown beard. In one of the attacks, he wore a blue, hooded sweatshirt, black pants and a mask, police said.The pickup is an early model Nissan Frontier, possible missing one or both license plates. Anyone with information is asked to call Rutherford police at 201-939-6000 Ext. 1.Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
